repository.corpname: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation & Archives

did.abstract: This is a collection of scrap books with news clippings and pamphlets about gangster activities. Pamphlets included : The Herrin Massacre by Chatland Parker (1923) ; The Bark of the Automatics, editorials by Fred J. Kern ; KKK Experiment in Journalism ; The Life Story of Charlie Birger : History of the Crimes of The Birger Gang

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This is a collection of scrap books with news clippings and pamphlets about gangster activities. Pamphlets included : The Herrin Massacre by Chatland Parker (1923) ; The Bark of the Automatics, editorials by Fred J. Kern ; KKK Experiment in Journalism ; The Life Story of Charlie Birger : History of the Crimes of The Birger Gang

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Oldham Paisley Scrapbooks on Microfilm #5181 mf. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
